message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! It's worth a lot to me, but I believe it would be a valuable asset for your business as well. My initial offer is $900000. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I appreciate your offer, I'm not quite there yet. Given the value of this product, I'm prepared to come down a bit further. How about $875000? This price is still fair considering the benefits you'll gain, and it brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $825000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
